# formats

**Instance Property**

The capture formats a device supports.

## Declaration

```swift
var formats: [AVCaptureDevice.Format] { get }
```

## Discussion

A capture device format describes the details of the video, image, or audio parameters of a specific mode of capture. If you require specifying capture settings not covered by a capture session preset, you can set the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/activeFormat] property to any of the formats in this array.

This property value is key-value observable.

## Configuring capture formats

- **activeFormat**: The capture format in use by the device.
- **activeDepthDataFormat**: The currently active depth data format of the capture device.
- **AVCaptureDevice.Format**: A class that defines media formats and capture settings that capture devices support.
